comment.author: 52888316@N07
comment._content: I own a tintype of this soldier's brother or friend. They were obviously taken at the same sitting probably seconds apart. They are holding similar weapons except my soldier has a large knife. Here is the link i34.photobucket.com/albums/d131/BryanWatson/cavbrother2.jpg

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
confederateimages,

Thanks for sharing your image.  They definitely look to be taken at the same sitting and on the same set - and both soldiers appear to be part of Company K of a cavalry regiment.  Very interesting!  Do you have any other information about your daguerreotype you could share?

comment.author: 36309053@N06
comment._content: confederateimages  - please repost your image, I'd love to see it but the link is broken.
